patthana23.48:1.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naācayagāmiṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho ācayagāmī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.48:2.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naapacayagāmiṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho apacayagāmī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.48:3.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nanevācayagāmināpacayagāmiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho nevācayagāmināpacayagāmī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.48:3.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa, adhipatiyā ekavīsa …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
